name: md5deep and hashdeep
short_description:
Development of this project has been moved to https://github.com/jessek/hashdeep. This site has been left for historical purposes ONLY. Please visit the GitHub site for current development.

Computes the MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, Tiger, or Whirlpool message digest for any number of files while optionally recursively digging through the directory structure. Can also match input files against lists of known hashes in a variety of formats.
summary: Recursively compute and match cryptographic hashes
